panels.title: GPU Temperature

queries.query: SELECT approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_gpu_temp"

panels.title: GPU Utilization

queries.query: SELECT approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_gpu_util"

panels.title: GPU Encoding Utilization

queries.query: SELECT avg(value) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_enc_util"

panels.title: GPU Decoding Utilization

queries.query: SELECT avg(value) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_dec_util"

panels.title: Modelname

queries.query: SELECT modelname as "x_axis_2", count(distinct(modelname)) as "y_axis_2"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_gpu_util"  GROUP BY x_axis_2

panels.title: XID Errors

queries.query:
SELECT gpu as "x_axis_1", 
       CASE 
         WHEN max(value) = 0 THEN 'Healthy 游릭' 
         ELSE 'Error' 
       END as "y_axis_1"
FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_xid_errors" 
GROUP BY x_axis_1
ORDER BY x_axis_1

panels.title: PCIe Retries

queries.query: SELECT gpu as "x_axis_1", CASE WHEN max(value) = 0 THEN 'Healthy 游릭' ELSE 'Error' END as "y_axis_1" FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_pcie_replay_counter" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1

panels.title: Correctable Row Remaps
panels.description: Memory rows remapped due to correctable errors

queries.query: SELECT gpu as "x_axis_1", CASE WHEN max(value) = 0 THEN 'Healthy 游릭' ELSE 'Error' END as "y_axis_1" FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_correctable_remapped_rows" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1

panels.title: Memory Row Remaps
panels.description: Memory rows remapped due to uncorrectable errors

queries.query: SELECT gpu as "x_axis_1", CASE WHEN max(value) = 0 THEN 'Healthy 游릭' ELSE 'Error' END as "y_axis_1" FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_uncorrectable_remapped_rows" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1

panels.title: Remap Failure

queries.query: SELECT gpu as "x_axis_1", CASE WHEN max(value) = 0 THEN 'Healthy 游릭' ELSE 'Error' END as "y_axis_1" FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_row_remap_failure" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1

panels.title: Memory Temperature

queries.query:
SELECT gpu as "x_axis_1", 
       CASE 
         WHEN approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) < 85 THEN 'Healthy 游릭'
         WHEN approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) >= 85 AND approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) < 95 THEN 'Warning 游리'
         ELSE 'Critical 游댮'
       END as "y_axis_1"
FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_memory_temp" 
GROUP BY x_axis_1 
ORDER BY x_axis_1

panels.title: GPU Temperature

queries.query:
SELECT gpu as "x_axis_1", 
       CASE 
         WHEN approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) < 85 THEN 'Healthy 游릭'
         WHEN approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) >= 85 AND approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) < 95 THEN 'Warning 游리'
         ELSE 'Critical 游댮'
       END as "y_axis_1"
FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_gpu_temp" 
GROUP BY x_axis_1 
ORDER BY x_axis_1

panels.title: GPU Utilization Peak
panels.description: Percentage of time GPU SM (Streaming Multiprocessor) was actively executing kernels

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) as "y_axis_1", device as "breakdown_1"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_gpu_util"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, breakdown_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC, y_axis_1 DESC

panels.title: Memory Utilization %
panels.description: Percentage of time GPU memory controller was busy copying data

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) as "y_axis_1", gpu as "breakdown_1"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_mem_copy_util"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, breakdown_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC, y_axis_1 DESC

panels.title: GPU Encoding Utilization %
panels.description: Video encoder usage (for video encoding tasks)

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) as "y_axis_1", gpu as "breakdown_1"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_enc_util"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, breakdown_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC, y_axis_1 DESC

panels.title: GPU Decoding Utilization %
panels.description: Video decoder usage (for video decoding tasks)

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) as "y_axis_1", gpu as "breakdown_1"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_dec_util"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, breakdown_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC, y_axis_1 DESC

panels.title: SM Clock MHz

queries.query: SELECT approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_sm_clock"

panels.title: Memory Clock MHz

queries.query: SELECT approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_mem_clock"

panels.title: GPU Temperature 춿C

queries.query: SELECT approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_gpu_temp"

panels.title: Memory Temperature 춿C

queries.query: SELECT approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_memory_temp"

panels.title: Power Draw in Watts

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) as "y_axis_1", gpu as "breakdown_1"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_power_usage"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, breakdown_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

panels.title: Total Energy in millijoules

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", avg(value) as "y_axis_1", gpu as "breakdown_1"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_total_energy_consumption"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, breakdown_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

panels.title: Frame Buffer Free

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) as "y_axis_1", gpu as "breakdown_1"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_fb_free"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, breakdown_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

panels.title: Frame Buffer Used

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", approx_percentile_cont(value, 0.95) as "y_axis_1", gpu as "breakdown_1"  FROM "dcgm_fi_dev_fb_used"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, breakdown_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
